title: Nightmares from the Deep 2: The Sirens Call CE (2013) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Nightmares from the Deep 2: The Sirens Call CE (2013) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

The rain slicked off his coat in rolling sheets as if compelled by the dark malevolence of the night itself. Lightning flashed at scattered intervals, and the thunderclaps carried on the wind were harsh and wanton. But there was no turning back. Oddly enough, he was hopeful. He had to deliver the artifact, no matter what the cost. Sarah Black could change the course of his fate, and the fates of so many othersÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
When Sarah Black receives a package from a mysterious messenger, she doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t realize that by opening it and releasing its contents she has awoken an ancient conflict, and fallen headfirst into it. She is attacked and kidnapped by a dark, terrifying assailant, and suddenly Sarah finds herself trapped in yet another nightmareÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ a nightmare of abyssal whispers from the places beyond where light touchesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ a nightmare from the deep.

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

Sequel to the hit game: Nightmares from the Deep: The Cursed Heart.
A chilling story of crime and curses, true love, and pirates.
Explore the forsaken fishing town, a ship cemetery, dark caves, and the majestic lighthouse.
Interactive hidden-object scenes, mahjong, and various minigames.
Three kinds of collectible objects to find.
A built-in achievement system.
Collector's Edition includes an additional adventure, concept art, wallpapers, a stunning soundtrack and fully integrated strategy guide for the basic game.
